title: Substitute midlaner for OOL team, Something Legit. 15 points in group stage.
body:
Ign: SeaguII.
No trial needed as this is a desperate measure. 
Not much time left so hurry up and send me a message ASAP.

replies.body: I mean i didnt realise this is wat u wanted cause u didnt explain it very well but i am here if needed still.
